page.title: 17JULIANA HORATIA EWING
page.content: Margeret and Alfred Gatty had a daughter called Julliana Horatia Ewing she also wrote childrens books "Lob Lie by the Fire"appeared first in magazines but then her reputation grew.Later she wrote a story called'The Brownies'from which the Brownies got their name.Juliana married colonel Ewing in 1867.In 1879 she died at the age of 46 and is buried in a country church yard in Somerset but she is commemorated in Ecclesfield by a stained glass window .She published in 1863 'The History of British seaweeds'and was highly regarded by professionals in the field).
